name: Water Boiling Simulator
description:
So, I know that with PICO-8 it is quite easy to export for web, but in this game, I wanted to flesh out the "reset game" part , and I didn't have enough time to implement it. So, sorry Chromebook users :(

The web version will be available both here and on Newgrounds when it releases (probably in a week or two).

Small bug-fixes are coming tomorrow!

CREDITS

@MrWolfyer - it's... me.

Follow for more updates!

Thanks for viewing this page!
